name: Pixel Bowmaster
description:
This is a short game that I’ve decided to make after youtube started to recommend some game jam videos, they were so interesting and since I was learning programing, specifically python, I decided to make a little game with pygame as a learning method and to have some fun. After some thinking I decided to remake an old windows game that I used to play with my father in my style. The actual game is called Bow and Arrow. All the pixel art was created by me, except the romans, which my brother Rafael made for my game. This game can be found at http://vodiniz.itch.io/pixel-bowmaster and at https://github.com/vodiniz/pixel_bowmaster

The .exe file was made with pyinstaller.
